message.name: LM_TASK_SETPROGRESSVALUE
message.description: LiteStep sends this message when an application has called ITaskbarList3::SetProgressValue.

parameter.name: wParam
parameter.description: A handle to the window whose progress value should be changed.

parameter.name: lParam
parameter.description: The new progress value. This value is between 0 and TASKSETPROGRESSVALUE_MAX.

remarks.p: To receive this message, modules need to register for it by using LM_REGISTERMESSAGE.
